show.title: Mahabharatham
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/wvX2TA
show.description: Kobam, Dhrogam, Bayam, Kaamam, Santhosam, Kavalai nu  Manitha manasoda ellaa  unarchigalaiyum konda oru arputha kaaviyam Mahabaratham. Oru latcham varigal la vysar ezhuthina muzhumaiyaana mahabarathathoda elimaiyaana thamizh vadivam intha audiobook.  Sahitya Akademi virudhu vaanguna pugazh petra thamizh ezhuthaalar 'Na. Parthasarathy'in inimaiyaana thamizh nadaiyil uruvaana intha audiobook la Saguni senja sadhi, Dharman senja thappu, Paanjaali edutha sabatham, Karnanoda Natpu, Arjunannoda mana kuzhappam, bagavan Krishnarin arivuraigal nu yeraalamaana visayangal irukku. Kelunga !
show.description_secondary: Kobam, Dhrogam, Bayam, Kaamam, Santhosam, Kavalai nu  Manitha manasoda ellaa  unarchigalaiyum konda oru arputha kaaviyam Mahabaratham. Oru latcham varigal la vysar ezhuthina muzhumaiyaana mahabarathathoda elimaiyaana thamizh vadivam intha audiobook.  Sahitya Akademi virudhu vaanguna pugazh petra thamizh ezhuthaalar 'Na. Parthasarathy'in inimaiyaana thamizh nadaiyil uruvaana intha audiobook la Saguni senja sadhi, Dharman senja thappu, Paanjaali edutha sabatham, Karnanoda Natpu, Arjunannoda mana kuzhappam, bagavan Krishnarin arivuraigal nu yeraalamaana visayangal irukku. Kelunga !

resume_episode.title: Dharmam thaazhum podhu adharmam thalai thookum
